PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-11622011-10-06,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS, which would remove the Source Country class from the Regulations in order to allow Citizenship and Immigration Canada to manage application intake and focus the resettlement program on priority refugee situations where Canada can work with partners like the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, private sponsors and other resettlement countries.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0222 Publication Date: 2011-10-26
AttachmentsAttachment
